table.name: invoice_note
table.description: Unlimited notes per invoice. Freeform, timestamped notes that can be used to indicate explanations/information throughout the lifetime of the invoice.

columns.name: INVOICE_NOTE_SEQ_NO
columns.description: The Invoice Note Sequence number specifies the order of notes on the invoice or bill.

columns.name: TIMESTAMP
columns.description: The day, month, and year of the note on the invoice.

columns.name: IS_SYSTEM_GENERATED
columns.description: Indicates whether this is system generated or not.

columns.name: ENTERED_BY
columns.description: The name and domain of the person who entered notes about the invoice.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
